name: 中級寫作（二）
restrict: ◎必須先修過【ENU0237  寫作指導（一）】、【ENU0238  寫作指導（二）】、【ENU0287  中級寫作（一）】 ◎課程開放上修
goals: 1.　To help students student develop their ability to express themselves in writing essays in English
2.　To help students write various kinds of essays in a well-organized manner
syllabus:
**Overview:**

This writing course aims to guide students to (1) practice basic academic writing conventions, (2) sharpen their analytical essay writing skills, (3) enhance essay coherence and cohesion, and (4) improve accuracy and concision in language use.

The course will familiarise students with proper academic language and conventions to compose short essays on modes of writing such as argumentation, definition, causal analysis, process analysis, and comparison and contrast.

In addition to the different analytical modes of writing, the course will introduce students to organising and editing strategies to fine-tune their essay writing. Students will learn how to apply principles of coherence and cohesion to maintain consistent claims and to offer logical transitions. Additionally, students will learn how to improve their accuracy and concision in language use by avoiding common sentence errors and improving concision and specificity in word choice and sentence formation.

**Course Components**

Longer Pieces of Writing:

1\. Comparison / Contrast Essay

2\. Cause and Effect Essay

3\. Descriptive Essay

Short Pieces of Writing:

1\. Timed Essays

**Evaluation**

Longer Pieces of Writing: 60%

Short Pieces of Writing: 20%

Attendance and Participation: 20%

**Notes**

Assignments must be done on time. Late submissions will be penalized.

Attendance is required. Being over 30 minutes late will be treated as an absence. 

Grades are not negotiable.
